name: Ms Nampac
description:
A MS Pacman tribute, done for the ZX Spectrum at full colour. 
Graphics by Jarlaxe.

We're pending further improvements and expect some bugs on current version, but I would prefer releasing so you could test it and enjoy it!

Like paku paku, my disclaimer: Namco/Atari/Whoever the current Pac Man license holder is -- this game is meant as a tribute and is not being released for profit. At no time have I viewed or examined the source code to Pac-Man, and base all of this recreation upon observations and freely available information off the Internet.
